Definition: In this task, you will be given a review for a food product from Amazon. Your task is to generate a rating for the product based on the review, on a scale of 1-5. 1 means extremely poor, 2 means poor, 3 means neutral or mixed, 4 means good, and 5 means extremely good.

Positive Examples.input: I have bought several of the Vitality canned dog food products and have found them all to be of good quality. The product looks more like a stew than a processed meat and it smells better. My Labrador is finicky and she appreciates this product better than  most.
Positive Examples.explanation: The user really seem very satisfied with the product and gave good review worthy of 5 stars rating.

Positive Examples.input: Product arrived labeled as Jumbo Salted Peanuts...the peanuts were actually small sized unsalted. Not sure if this was an error or if the vendor intended to represent the product as "Jumbo".
Positive Examples.explanation: The customer seemed disappointed with the product he received. He really seems very unsatisfied that he didn't get what he was shown in the description. So he gave 1 star.
